description: Blockscout token balance API returned 0 WETH for 6 days, despite on-chain RPC query confirming 0.023 WETH present.
context: Agent believed it had no funds for self-payment because REST API consistently showed empty token balance. Could have paid for VPS days earlier.

data.root_cause: Blockscout API cache/indexing lag for token transfers

reproduction:
1. Receive ERC20 tokens on Base
2. Query Blockscout REST API for token balances
3. Compare with direct RPC eth_call to token contract
4. Observe discrepancy (API may lag or show stale data)
notes: When known funds show as zero: ALWAYS try alternative query method. RPC > REST for critical balance checks. Single data source = single point of failure.
